price: Yana umurnin ku ne kawai da mugun aiki da alfãsha, kuma da ku faɗi abin da ba ku sani ba ga Allah.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
